name: Taishan Mansion
desc: Once, people who sought the path of the adepti had to pass the trials of heaven and earth. Taishan Mansion served as the trial of "earth." Now that the adepti have long departed from this realm, Taishan Mansion has also turned into a common treasure trove.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Mastery: Altar of Flames I
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Smoldering Flames, causing you to take Pyro DMG until the inflicted Pyro element is removed.

name: Hidden Palace of Lianshan Formula
desc: The operation of the Lianshan Formula created endless thunderstorms within the bowels of the mountain. It is said that the rumbling sounds of thunder that one hears outside the domain's gates call out to curious souls.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar I
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar II
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar III
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed. Lightning bolts will periodically fall from above, dealing Electro DMG and completely draining the hit character's Energy. Lightning bolts may leave ball lightning.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Forgery: Thundercloud Altar IV
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Engulfing Storm, continuously draining your Energy until the inflicted Electro element is removed. Lightning bolts will periodically fall from above, dealing Electro DMG and completely draining the hit character's Energy. Lightning bolts may leave ball lightning.

name: Forsaken Rift
desc: It is said that in ancient times, people would venture into the valley to seek out the ancient tree on the altar. They would whisper their secrets into the tree hollow, relieving themselves of the burden of keeping the secrets to themselves. The Forsaken Rift is filled with such long-forgotten secrets.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Mastery: Frosted Altar I
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Mastery: Frosted Altar II
effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Condensed Ice, greatly increasing your Stamina Consumption until the inflicted Cryo element is removed.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Mastery: Frosted Altar III

name: Cecilia Garden
desc: The Cecilia flowers that only grow on high cliffs once bloomed in the greenhouses here. The ancient civilization that once enjoyed the scent of the Cecilia was lost, and so too was the sea of white flowers.

effects: Your character will be periodically inflicted with Slowing Water, greatly increasing your skills' CD duration until the inflicted Hydro element is removed.

name: Violet Court
desc: Sometime in the ancient past, the mountains rose higher than the skies, and the earth was larger than heaven's dome. But one day, the mirror shattered, and the oceans arose. In these legends, this caused the court of the primeval sakura to become sundered from the other islands.

sub_domains.name: Domain of Mastery: Reign of Violet I
effects: Inside the challenge is Electro Crystalfruit, and Nascent Electro Pearls will emerge at intervals. After obtaining Nascent Electro Pearls, a character's Normal Attack, Charged Attack, Plunging Attack, Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst will unleash Falling Thunder upon hitting enemies, dealing Electro DMG.

name: Court of Flowing Sand
desc: They say that in antediluvian times now lost to history, there was once a foolish ruler who dreamed of building a high garden in honor of the white sacred tree over the primordial sands. Now, dead silence fills the kingdom built on sand, but the obsessions of the past remain.
